name: Monster Linker
description:
This is a student project made as practical exam for Games Academy. We had about 2 month time to develop this as a practical exam.

Link up with your monster and control it in a 1 on 1 cage fight scenario against computer controlled enemies.
Choose your moves, enhance your damage and defense by succeeding in QTEs and fight your way to the top!

Featuring:
- 1 Arena
- 5 Enemies
- 7 Special Attacks

This game is meant to be played with XBox-Controler.

We hope you enjoy playing!
